summary: The International Bureau of Education (IBE), a specialized agency of the United Nations, plays a pivotal role in the global educational landscape. Within the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, the IBE facilitates the development of educational policies and practices that align with international standards. It serves as a repository of knowledge, promoting educational innovation and collaboration among member states. The Bureau's initiatives support the EU's objectives of enhancing educational quality and accessibility, thereby contributing to the overarching goals of sustainable development and social cohesion. The IBE's work is integral to fostering an inclusive and equitable educational environment across Europe.
